input.sentences: while driving through a city | i saw these lights going off .
the next set of lights looked literally as if they were on fire .
watching the sunset always makes me feel so calm .
the mountain in the background looks like a mound of ice cream .
for this to be the last scene before the sun fully sets is magical .
output.sentences: The fireworks lit up over Seattle.
They glowed as bright as the setting sun.
The sun reflected off of the lake.
It cast shadows over Mt. St. Helens as it sunk deeper.
The last rays lit the clouds in a deep red and vibrant orange.
